name: Ruihui Li
content: Li Ruihui @ HNU Ruihui Li (李瑞辉) Professor College of Computer Science and Electronic Engineering Hunan University, Changsha, Hunan Province liruihui [at] hnu [dot] edu [dot] cn [Twitter] [中文主页] Research Interest Deep Geometry Learning, Generative modeling, 3D Vision, and Computer graphics, particularly interested for 3D reconstruction and generation with high controllability. News I am looking for self-motivated Ph.D./MPhil. students, RAs, PostDocs, and Visiting scholars to join my group. Please drop me an email with your CV if you are interested.
